storyInfo: Sona gets her hand on the data she needs, only to have her eyes opened by a phone call: Everything is going according to the Armorless Union's plans.

attributes.text: Did Greynuty succeed? Did Sona make it inside?
When all is said and done, will we really be able to live in peace here in Kazimierz?

attributes.content: Don't kid yourself.
attributes.name: Jamie

attributes.content: Think of what we had to go through.
attributes.name: Jamie

attributes.content: We had to fight wild beasts in the underground arenas, sometimes even our fellow men. We still carry the pain and scars that will never go away.
attributes.name: Jamie

attributes.content: The bosses wanted more blood and excitement, they wanted us to throw matches, and do their shady bidding outside the arena. We had no choice but to do what they wanted.
attributes.name: Jamie

attributes.content: What do you think all that was for?
attributes.name: Jamie

attributes.content: Look at all those places outside Kawalerielki. Where do you think the Infected can go?
attributes.name: Jamie

attributes.content: Where we can go...?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: We have Oripathy, an incurable disease. We will die sooner or later, and when we do, we'll lay waste to whatever unfortunate patch of ground we collapse onto.
attributes.name: Jamie

attributes.content: We are ominous, we are uncontrollable, and we are different. We are here to be despised.
attributes.name: Jamie

attributes.content: Do you think the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi will really allow the Infected to start a proper knightclub?
attributes.name: Jamie

attributes.content: Is there really room for the Infected to live in Kazimierz... no... anywhere in this world?
attributes.name: Jamie

attributes.content: And even if there were...
attributes.name: Jamie

attributes.content: ...what does that have to do with you?
attributes.name: Jamie

attributes.content: She's not moving... Is she dead?
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member A

attributes.content: I sure hope so. I don't really want to fight the Infected. I mean, what if we catch it?
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member B

attributes.content: Go take a closer look. If she's dead, we'll need the damage control team up here.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member B

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Who... are you calling dead?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: C'mon!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You dirty... Armorless! I'll... take all of you down!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You murderers... You all have Infected blood on your hands!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: She still has the strength to move...?
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member A

attributes.content: She's bloody all over. She can barely even stand. Just give up already.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member A

attributes.content: Come on... Come at me!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: None of you... are getting away... *cough*!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: She's got backbone, I'll give her that. Let's show her some mercy. Finish her off.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member B

attributes.content: I mean, she's going to bleed out in a few minutes. Man, Monique really knows what she's doing with those techniques.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member B

attributes.text: If... If I were stronger... and faster...
Move... Dammit... Why is my vision so blurry...?

attributes.content: It's okay. It'll all be over soonâ€”
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: All of a sudden, the Armorless stop what they are doing.
(Footsteps).
The footsteps are heavy, not like the light footsteps of these murderers, like whomever is making them is carrying a boulder that weighs a thousand pounds.
(Muffled conversation)
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: (What are they... talking about...?)
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (Muffled conversation)
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: (...? Why are they...?)
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: No... Don't go... Stay right... where you are! I can still...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Let it go, knight.
You've done very well.
What's going on? Why is it dark all of a sudden?!
attributes.name: A Tourist A

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: A Tourist B

attributes.content: Huh?! Is the power out all over town?! Lord, how much money are we going to owe for this?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Hey, you, the knight over there. Come help evacuate the audience!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Phew.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Whoa... It's pitch black outside...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Are you sure you guys aren't overdoing it, Greynuty?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Still...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The K.G.C.C.'s building has its own power source... Grr... We're almost out of time.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Huh? Someone's here!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Why did the power go out?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee A

attributes.content: Look outside! The whole city'sâ€”
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee B

attributes.content: I-Is there a problem with the power plant again? Is this another Great Separation?!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee A

attributes.content: Calm down.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Oh, Mr. Malkiewicz...
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee A

attributes.content: Fortunately, the spokesmen's meeting is today. The directors are all inside the Chamber building right now, safe and sound.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: That's right. Follow instructions and help evacuate the crowds. Contact the Adeptus leadership. Our first and foremost priority is to make sure there isn't a lapse in public order.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Each district should have its own backup power source. Have the officers-in-charge make the necessary arrangements.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: The Board of Directors meeting...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: No, my priority right now is to find the machine roomâ€”
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Lazurite, sir!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Well, things have gotten way out of hand...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: That's why I said we had to be more decisive with the Infected. We can't give them an opening.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Lucky the directors summoned me here today. Who knows what could've happened to our bosses?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: We'll review this series of events later.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: No problem, but most of the Armorless Union... and Monique are rounding the Infected up and snuffing them out right now. It might take them some time to get back...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Very well... For the time being, please put your original mission on hold and ensure the directors' safety.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Okay, though I... no one would dare go after the Board, right?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Snuffing them out...?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: No... They'll be okay... I...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I gotta hurry.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Please... Please be okay, Iwona.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Where are you?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Fartooth!
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Plastic...?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Have you seen the others? They took out our commsâ€”
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: It's not that simple. We're in the middle of the city. If they managed to cut off our comms, that means our channels were intercepted right from the start.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: It wasn't Ashlock who took out the power either. The power plant went down before she could start her ambush. She's probably heading to where Flametail is right now.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: The Armorless... They've been planning something, and they're passing the buck to the Infectedâ€”
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Find the others! We're in real hot water right now!
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Iwona!
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Justyna finds the prideful Infected knight collapsed in a pool of blood.
Her armor is stained a gory red.
Iwona! Wake up!
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: S-She's still breathing...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Szewczyk, give me a handâ€”
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Hold on... Has someone else... been here?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: The Armorless assassins don't use axes... And even if they had an axeman, these marks...
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: The wall... is oozing blood?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: It's him...?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Download complete.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: So this is the plan for Area 0... and some sensitive information on the Armorless.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It feels weird being able to get my hands on this stuff so easily...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Now let me get out of this stinking placeâ€”Argh, my tailâ€”
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: What are you standing there for?! Hurry up and contact the National Council!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: And you! Isn't your department supposed to help evacuate the Fireblade Arena? Get moving!
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: We'll escort the spokeslady. Is she on the second floor?
attributes.name: A Kazimierz Knight

attributes.content: (Things are a mess here... Perfect.)
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: (I just hope I can get away without much trouble.)
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: No way...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Did someone seriously sneak into the K.G.C.C. building during the chaos?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: (Did he see meâ€”?!)
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Graah...!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Owww... Where am I... Was I leaning on the door? I didn't even notice...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It's dark. Uh, is this a meeting room...?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I gotta find a way outâ€”
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Sona has always felt as though she is fighting against something.
Against the Armorless Union, against the General Chamber of Commerce, against all the injustices the Infected face, and against even fate.
She has never actually doubted whether her actions are necessary.
But, right this moment, she feels a chill reaching from her head all the way to her feet, causing her to waver a little.
Indeed, this is the first time she has ever wavered.
It's as though she's just seen a tremendous ice sculpture in the middle of summer.
A call is coming in.
The ringing echoes throughout the empty room.
Hello?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Flametail Knight... Sona.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: I appreciate your efforts. Excellent work.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Right now, you have two options.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: 'Lazurite' Roy is standing outside the conference room you are in, as we speak.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: This is going to be a very simple transaction. You are holding two storage devices.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Hand over the one on the Armorless Union. You may keep the information on Area 0.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: That will be more than enough for you to bargain the right to a legitimate life from the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: The way I see it, you have no other choice.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Get a grasp of the situation, Flametail Knight. I have nothing against the Infected, much less you.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Be it knights, merchants, or Infected, they are all narrow-minded.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Don't make an enemy of society, Infected.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: The server has already been destroyed. The chip in your hand is the very last copy.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: The choice is yours.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Perhaps you are thinking of smashing this telephone right now.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Then do it... if you believe that's the answer to your revolt against fateâ€”
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Whoa... He figured it out, huh? That's something.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: So, the Lazurite is right outside the door now. What do I do...?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Which floor is this again...?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: This... This is way too high, isn't itâ€”?!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Sona!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Ashley, catch me!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: â€”What are you up to this time? Why are you up therâ€”Whoaâ€”!
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Owww... Good thing I used Arts to soften the impact...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Wh-Why are you looking at me like that? Alright, no more wild moves... Now let go of my tail, will you?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I'm glad... you're okay.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Somebody took out the power plant before we could get to it. Whoever they are, they're using us.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: No matter... We have what we need.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ta-dah!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: This...? A small little chip like this... can change our fates?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: We'll just have to hope it can.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Whew... That's gotta be at least a dozen meter jump.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: And look at you, still so full of pep, Infected. Haven't had enough yet?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Hey! That getup...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: You know me?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: The Armorless Union keeps its top levels secret from regular old knights... But...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: 'Lazurite' Roy. You're the only Lazurite assassin who hasn't been replaced in the past dozen-or-so years. There are all kinds of rumors centered around you. Of course we know you.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Really? Haha, glad to know I'm famous. It's not necessarily a good thing for an assassin to be famous, though. I mean, the Armorless Union's not like you knights. We can't cash in on our fame.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: So, either you hand me the chip and walk out alive, or I kill you and take the chip myself.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Personally, I'm not very fond of fighting to the death, especially when there's no money in it.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Sona... are you okay?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Phew, I'm fine. This is gonna be a tough fight, though.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We just need to stay alive.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Heh, how long has it been since the last time we fought side by side for real? Since our fight against the gloompincer?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Come on, give me more credit than that. I think I can at least put up a better fight than a gloompincer.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Good thing I have these emergency lights. I never thought they'd actually come in handy.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: What's going on? Another Great Separation?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: The power's really out for the whole town! What kind of sick joke is this? How could this happen while the Major's on?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: The power will be back soon... but... just who managed plunge a city that never sleeps into darkness?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Ridiculous... Just ridiculous.
attributes.name: MÅ‚ynar
